name: merge topic and payload
func:
msg.payload = msg.topic.replace("/button", " But") + " " + msg.payload
return msg;

func:

name: label temperature 0-3
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("temp0") + " " + flow.get("temp1") + " " + flow.get("temp2") + " " +  flow.get("temp3")
return msg;
